title: Welcome To My Blog
text:
This is the first post in a Quarto blog. Welcome!

Since this post doesn’t specify an explicit image, the first image in the post will be used in the listing page of posts.

title: Post With Code
text: This is a post with executable code.

title: Luca Modica
text:
I’m Luca Modica, full-stack developer and aspirant machine learning engineer / AI researcher, graduated at University of Turin in Computer Science. 👨🏻‍💻
Also thanks to my thesis, I expand my topic of interest to social computing and HCI, in particular about the gamification of platforms 🕹️ (check out my bachelor’s thesis work here!).
My current dream is to intersect these topics with my recent passion in artificial intelligence, in particular about SOTA neural networks 🧠 (Kaggle profile here).

title: Luca Modica
text:
Interest ✨
Addicted by code, amazed by AI and affascinated by data science. 🤖 Food&Beer lover 🍔🍻, owner of a doggo 🐶 and average book enjoyer. 📖
I have a secret love for penguins. Below you will find a scatterplot of three of the many species, as a sign of appreciation. 💓🐧

import seaborn as sns
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
g = sns.FacetGrid(sns.load_dataset('penguins'), hue='species', height=3, aspect=3.5/1.5)
g.map(plt.scatter, 'bill_length_mm', 'bill_depth_mm').add_legend()
